    • createGroup

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GroupDTO> createGroup(@PathVariable String projectName, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid GroupDTO groupDto) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Create group.
      Parameters:
      projectName - project name
      groupDto - group specification
      Returns:
      created response
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException - if PROJECT_UPDATE permissions are not present.

      projectName - project name
      Returns:
      list of groups
      Throws:

    • changeGroupSubjects

      @PatchMapping("/{groupName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/subjects") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changeGroupSubjects(@PathVariable String projectName, @PathVariable String groupName, @RequestBody List<GroupPatchOperation> patchOperations) throws org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException
      Add subjects to a single group.
      Parameters:
      projectName - project name
      groupName - group name
      patchOperations - json-patch request body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.auth.exception.NotAuthorizedException - if PROJECT_UPDATE permissions are not present.
